headline: One Is Hurt as U.S. Embassy in Baghdad Takes Fire
abstract: For the second time in a week, shelling targeted the American Embassy in Baghdad. The Iraqi government promised a strong response.
lead_paragraph: BAGHDAD â€” The United States Embassy in Baghdad was struck by mortar fire late Sunday, with at least one shell hitting a dining facility, slightly injuring one person and causing minor building damage, American officials said.
keywords: United States Defense and Military Forces
